text: Mushure mazvo, ndimi murikuurayana pachenyu uye kubuditsa chidimbu chenyu kubva mudzimba dzavo, muchibatsirana (nevavengi) mukupokana navo muchitadza nekuita ruvengo. Uye kana vakauya kwamuri varinhapwa, munovabvisira chidzikinuro, kunyangwe kuvadzinga kwavo makange makarambidzwa. Nokudaro munotenda here muchidimbu cheGwaro moramba chimwe? Saka ndeupi mubairo wevanoita zvakadaro pakati penyu, kunze kwenyadzi muupenyu hwepano pasi, uyezve neZuva rokumutswa vachava vanopihwa mutongo wakaomarara. Uye Allah havarivari zvamunoita
